item.title: Getting Started with Retrieval
item.description: Getting started with retrieval, build your own RALM with RALMify

item.title: Inference for fun and profit
item.description: Generative AI is all the rage, and for good reason, but actually implementing an inference pipeline has many challenges, not the least of which is getting and serving a model to our peers.
